column4: What is the Ubuntu way of installing Apache modules? Do I use apt-get or something similar as opposed to downloading and compiling?
Robyrails: are you looking for a good ROR editor?

Well to add to the discussion I use Aptana Studio and Gedit. I'm slowly weening myself off of Aptana though... with a little time you can configuring Gedit to act very similar to Textmate. The only downer is that I haven't found any SVN integration yet.
you could try installing nautilus-script-collection-svn , it gives you most of the svn stuff you need as a right click
